import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Menu } from 'lucide-react'; const Header = ({ currentPage, setCurrentPage }) => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); return (
setCurrentPage('homepage')} className="flex items-center space-x-4">

The Shan Booth
  • { setCurrentPage('homepage'); setIsMenuOpen(false); }} className="block py-2 px-4">Homepage
  • { setCurrentPage('photobooths'); setIsMenuOpen(false); }} className="block py-2 px-4">Photobooths
  • { setCurrentPage('events'); setIsMenuOpen(false); }} className="block py-2 px-4">Events
  • { setCurrentPage('packages'); setIsMenuOpen(false); }} className="block py-2 px-4">Packages
); }; export default Header;
